key_findings.spawn_action_note: The spec envisions server-side agent execution via an AgentRunner class, but current MCP architecture has agents as LLM chat modes (VS Code Copilot chat participants). The practical implementation should validate the agent + return its instructions/context for the Coordinator to use in runSubagent, rather than executing the agent server-side.
